Author: LowCalPal
Text: I’m relapsed right now, but I was recovered for years prior to this.  The Voice never *completely* went away, but I’d go long stretches without really paying attention to it.  It would be quiet enough not to notice for weeks or months at a time, and when it came back, it just didn’t seem important enough to listen to.  It didn’t have as much power.  I’m in treatment now, working on getting that back.
